title: Friends (Ithaca) - Fragile (1972) (UK folk) (mp3, 128 kbps)
description:
Friends - "Fragile"  (1972)  (UK folk)  (mp3, 128 kbps)


includes cover scans.


Final album by the duo behind Ithaca, Agincourt, Alice Through The Looking Glass, and Tomorrow Come Someday.


Shortly after the Ithaca release (1972), which was a bit more of a Ferdinando Project, Peter Howell was invited to work at the BBC Radiophonic Workshop, so the duo's last recording "Friends", mainly a Peter Howell Project, was never released.  It has the recognisable Ithaca and Agincourt sound, mostly with different lead vocals (mainly by Peter Howell), but with all the same elements and participants.
